Name: Puputan Legend VR
About the game: Puputan Legend VR Patih Kebo Iwa - is a custom multiplayer online battle arena game. Inspired by the history of the archipelago, this game has a puputan war theme with the icon Patih Kebo Iwa, the hero from Bali. This game will be played by two teams of 5 players each. The two teams will fight each other to the death and only 1 team / player will win the puputan war this game has several excellent features, namely: (1) Puputan Team Match; teammate play mode (has a play time limit) (2) Puputan Royale; teamless play mode to defeat all enemies (other players) and be the winner (has a play time limit) (3) Co-Op; play mode with friends to fight and defeat the monsters of the archipelago (has a play time limit) (4) Cross Play PC VR and Quest Support Device HTC Vive + Controller Oculus Rift/S + Controller
